thread.section_title: CardKangaroo.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CardKangaroo.com | cardkangaroo.com | 4 of 86
thread.title: Johnni

author: Johnni
title: Johnni
text: I mailed a fully loaded gift card on the good faith hope that I would receive payment from CardKangaroo in my PayPal account. The result, they paid! Not only did they pay what they promised, but the turnaround time was much faster than I expected. I mailed a physical giftcard to their mailing address given and I started to send it priority with confirmation. I felt at ease knowing it was going to a PO Box so I sent regular postage; though, they provide paid postage. Nonetheless, everything went smoothly and I received the cash for the card. I would definitely use them again.
